FuncDef: The quit command quits the current view command and displays the previous view.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The views are listed as follows in ascending order by the level:
User viewSystem viewRouting protocol view, interface view, and VPDN group view
The quit command enables the system to quit the current view and display the previous view.

Configuration Impact
Run the quit command in the user view to log out of the system.
